statements: SELECT * FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT region_name, forest_area_km2 FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_type = 'Tropical';
SELECT id, region_name, forest_type, year FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_area_km2 > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_type = 'Coniferous' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS total_changes FROM ForestCoverChanges GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE region_name='California' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT region_name, forest_type, year FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_area_km2 > 10000;
SELECT region_name, SUM(forest_area_km2) AS total_forest_cover FROM ForestCoverChanges GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT region_name, forest_type, year, reforestation_efforts FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY region_name, year DESC;
SELECT region_name, AVG(forest_area_km2) AS avg_forest_area FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_type = 'Deciduous' GROUP BY region_name HAVING AVG(forest_area_km2) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ForestCover WHERE forest_id = 1;
SELECT tree_species, area_acres FROM ForestCover WHERE plant_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(area_acres) FROM ForestCover;
SELECT project_name, success_rate FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE success_rate > 75.00;
SELECT * FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT forest_id, area_acres, tree_species, plant_date FROM ForestCover WHERE area_acres > 1000 ORDER BY area_acres DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, success_rate FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE success_rate > 80 ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT forest_id, tree_species, plant_date FROM ForestCover WHERE tree_species LIKE '%oak%' ORDER BY plant_date
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT project_name, success_rate FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE success_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT id, area, time FROM forest_cover WHERE id = 1
SELECT location, start_date, end_date FROM reforestation_projects WHERE project_id = 5
SELECT monitoring_id, project_id, area_check FROM forest_monitoring WHERE monitoring_id = 3
SELECT * FROM forest_cover ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT project_id, location FROM reforestation_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM forest_cover ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT area, time FROM forest_cover WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY time ASC
SELECT location, start_date, end_date FROM reforestation_projects WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest'
SELECT monitoring_id, project_id, area_check, date FROM forest_monitoring WHERE area_check >= 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT f.id, p.location, m.date FROM forest_cover f JOIN reforestation_projects p ON f.id = p.project_id JOIN forest_monitoring m ON p.project_id = m.project_id
SELECT * FROM ForestCoverChange;
SELECT id, area_name FROM ForestCoverChange WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT area_name, forest_coverage FROM ForestCoverChange ORDER BY forest_coverage DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ReforestationProjects;
SELECT project_id, assessment_date, success_rate FROM AssessmentResults WHERE success_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM ForestCoverChange;
SELECT area_name, year, forest_coverage FROM ForestCoverChange WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY forest_coverage DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE year(start_date) = 2021 AND year(end_date) = 2022 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT area_name, date, monitoring_type FROM MonitoringData WHERE monitoring_type = 'Satellite' AND area_name LIKE 'Forest%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT project_id, assessment_date, success_rate FROM AssessmentResults WHERE success_rate > 80 ORDER BY success_rate DESC, assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ForestRegion;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM ForestRegion ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, quantity FROM TreeInventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT region_name, parcel_area FROM ForestRegion JOIN ForestParcel ON ForestRegion.region_id = ForestParcel.region_id;
SELECT * FROM ForestRegion;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS region_count FROM ForestRegion GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM ReforestationProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, parcel_area FROM TreeSpecies JOIN ForestParcel ON TreeSpecies.species_id = ForestParcel.region_id;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM TreeInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
